sentences: It was such an unforgettable experience.
I don't even want to go anywhere near it.

today_delta.title: EBS 라디오 입이 트이는 영어 - 2.9 Silver Wedding Anniversary
today_delta.vocab:
splurge: 돈을 물 쓰듯 쓰기
sense of family: 가족애
cherish: 간직하다
today_delta.sentences:
We chose to travel independently.
It really made me realize how much time has passed.
In a foreign setting we had long conversations over drinks with our adult son.

message:
오늘의 영어 공부 (2026-02-09)

[오늘의 단어]
- splurge: 돈을 물 쓰듯 쓰기
- sense of family: 가족애
- cherish: 간직하다
- intimidating: 겁을 주는
- devastating: 청천벽력, 엄청나게 충격적인, 굉장한
- blurred: 흐릿한, 희미한, 모호한
- appropriately: 적당하게, 알맞게
- adjustable: 조절 가능한

[오늘의 문장]
- We chose to travel independently.
- It really made me realize how much time has passed.
- In a foreign setting we had long conversations over drinks with our adult son.
- My mind went blank.
- It was such an unforgettable experience.
- I don't even want to go anywhere near it.
